com.tomtom.speedtools.testutils.resteasy

Class AsynchronousTestResponse<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomtom.speedtools.testutils.resteasy.AsynchronousTestResponse<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the entity within the response.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jboss.resteasy.spi.AsynchronousResponse

    public final class AsynchronousTestResponse<T>
extends Object
implements org.jboss.resteasy.spi.AsynchronousResponse
    Asynchronous response class to used for testing. Use an instance of this class as the last argument of an asynchronous resource when testing the resource. After the resource has been 'invoked', the test can verify that the application has responded with a correct response by using 
    verifyEntity
    or 
    verifyStatus
    .

        @Nonnull
public T verifyEntity(@Nonnull
                               org.joda.time.Duration timeout)
                        throws UnexpectedResponseException
        Verify that the resource invocation resulted in an entity-response within given time. The status code is verified to be 200 (OK).
        Parameters:
        timeout - Time out value.
        Returns:
        Entity of the response.
        Throws:
        UnexpectedResponseException - If error.

                               Integer expectedStatus,
                               @Nonnull
                               org.joda.time.Duration timeout)
                        throws UnexpectedResponseException
        Verify that the resource invocation resulted in an entity-response within given time. Optionally the response status code is checked simultaneously.
        Parameters:
        expectedStatus - When set, the expected status code of the response.
        timeout - Time out value.
        Returns:
        Entity of the response.
